{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Tormentors''' are terrible [[tier-2 demon]]s which inflict [[torment]], tearing up characters without immunity or heavy resistance. They can be found in [[the Abyss]], [[Pandemonium]], the [[Hell]]s, and some monsters may summon them with [[Summon Greater Demon]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Tormentors are fast monsters which can halve your HP every turn. Not a big threat by themselves, but when near other monsters, make sure to finish them quickly.
*Tormentors can't see [[invisible]]. While being invisible won't stop them from ever casting Symbol of Torment, it greatly reduces the frequency. Note that if the tormentor can see an [[ally]] that's vulnerable to torment, the fact that ''you'' are invisible doesn't do anything.
*They have moderate [[willpower]], so status [[wand]]s can work well. A [[scroll of fear]] can scare them off with some reliability.
*If [[summon]]ed by a torment vulnerable monster (e.g. [[deep elf demonologist]]s), they'll be much more hesitant to use Symbol of Torment.
*As always, [[life protection]] (rN+) helps take the sting out of Torment significantly (5% reduction per rank). See the [[torment]] page for other means of reducing torment damage.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], tormentors used to cast the [[Pain]] spell.
*Prior to [[0.9]], tormentors were [[tier-3 demon]]s.
*Prior to [[0.6]], tormentors only possessed Symbol of Torment in their emergency slot, meaning they would virtually never use it, [[Zin]]'s Sanctuary ability being one of the few ways to make them do so.
